name: productivity-skills
description: Productivity and workflow optimization skills for analyzing usage patterns, auditing code, bootstrapping projects, and generating documentation

skills.name: conversation-analyzer
skills.description: Analyze Claude Code conversation history to identify patterns, common mistakes, and opportunities for workflow improvement. Activates when users want to understand their usage patterns, optimize workflows, or find automation opportunities.

skills.name: code-auditor
skills.description: Perform comprehensive codebase analysis covering architecture, quality, security, performance, testing, and maintainability. Activates when users want code audits, technical debt assessment, security reviews, or quality checks.

skills.name: project-bootstrapper
skills.description: Set up new projects or improve existing ones with best practices, tooling, documentation, testing, and workflow automation. Activates when users want to bootstrap projects, add development tooling, or standardize setups.

skills.name: codebase-documenter
skills.description: Generate comprehensive documentation explaining codebase architecture, components, data flow, and development guidelines. Activates when users want to understand unfamiliar code, create onboarding docs, or document systems.
